T02D1931:43a-1: shr'i krishna ya m'a ri s'a dha nam /
T02D1931:43a-2: sa tsa kra aartha bi sta ra bya khy'a /
T02D1931:43a-4: dpal gshin rje'i gshed dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1931:43a-5: 'khor lo'i don rgyas par bshad pa dang bcas pa /
T02D1931:43a-6: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1931:43a-7: mkha' ltar spros med chos sku rnam dag dngos //
T02D1931:43a-8: 'gro mgon 'jam dbyangs khro rgyal phyag 'tshal te //
T02D1931:43a-9: gshin rje gshed po dpal ldan de yi ni //
T02D1931:43a-10: sgrub pa'i thabs bzang 'khor lo bcas pa bshad //
T02D1931:43a-11: byang chub kyi sems gnyis shin tu brtan pa'i sngags pas tho rangs langs te /
T02D1931:43a-12: lus kyi bya ba ma lus par byas la /
T02D1931:43a-14: bla ma dang dkon mchog gsum dang /
T02D1931:43a-15: dpal gshin rje 'joms pa rnams 'od kyis bskul ba la /
T02D1931:43a-16: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa bdun dang /
T02D1931:43a-18: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams byas la stong pa nyid du bsam mo //
T02D1931:43a-19: de nas yud tsam gyis ma he'i steng du padma dang nyi mar bltas te /
T02D1931:43a-20: de'i dbus su h'um ngam lam gyi sa bon gyur pa las rdo rje'o//
T02D1931:43a-21: de gyur pa las gshin rje 'joms par bdag nyid bsam pa ni /
T02D1931:43a-22: zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa mi bzad pa'i khro
T02D1931:43a-23: bo sku mdog mthing ga zhal g-yas g-yon dkar ba
T02D1931:43a-24: dang dmar ba / phyag g-yas g-yon na rdo rje dang /
T02D1931:43a-25: ral gri dang gri gug dang 'khor lo dang /
T02D1931:43b-1: de nas de'i phung po lnga ni gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa lnga'o //
T02D1931:43b-2: khams bzhi ni tsa rtsi k'a la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D1931:43b-3: lag pa g-yas pa'i dpung pa dang g-yon pa'i dpung pa dang kha'i padma dang /
T02D1931:43b-4: gsang ba'i gnas rnams ni tho ba gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bzhi'o zhes mos par bya'o //
T02D1931:43b-5: de nas ye shes sems dpa' bstims la /
T02D1931:43b-7: de nas sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs la dbang bskur te /
T02D1931:43b-8: spyi bo la rdo rje sems dpas brgyan par bya'o //
T02D1931:43b-9: de nas snying ga'i yam las spro ba dang bsdu ba skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du bya'o //
T02D1931:43b-10: skyo ba na aom ya ma r'a dza sa do
T02D1931:43b-11: me ya ya me do ru na yo da ya
T02D1931:43b-12: / ya da yo ni da ya kshe ya ya kshe ya tstsha ni r'a ma ya /
T02D1931:43b-13: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1931:43b-15: yang na rim pas bzlas so //
T02D1931:43b-16: gal te 'khor lo bsgrub par mi 'dod na las kyi sngags 'ba' zhig bzlas so //
T02D1931:43b-17: gal te las la mi dmigs na snying po'i sngags 'ba' zhig kyang bzlas te /
T02D1931:43b-18: aom ya m'anta ka h'um snying po'o //
T02D1931:43b-19: bzlas pa'i tshad ni re re la yang bye ba phrag gsum dang /
T02D1931:43b-21: de nas bzlas pas skyo ba na /
T02D1931:43b-22: ye shes sems dpa' la mchod pa dang /
T02D1931:43b-25: yan lag drug gis srung ba byas la /
T02D1931:43b-26: yi ge brgya pa bzlas la ldang ngo //
T02D1931:43b-27: langs nas kyang gsang sngags sku la dmigs shing grangs la phan mi 'dogs pa bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1931:43b-28: dang po rnal 'byor la 'jug pa na /
T02D1931:43b-29: aom aindra ya hr'i: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1931:43b-30: dus rtag tu bdag dang gzhan chu zla ltar gcig dang du ma dang bral bar blta'o //
T02D1931:43b-31: bsnyen pa ma rdzogs kyi bar du gnas gcig tu spyad par bya'o //
T02D1931:43b-32: 'di ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i rim pa mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1931:43b-33: de ltar bsnyen par gyur pa'i sngags pa 'khrul 'khor bsgrub par 'dod pas /
T02D1931:43b-35: dang po kho nar 'di la mngon spyod bya bar rigs sam /
T02D1931:43b-36: ci ste ma yin zhes gzhi gtan la dbab par bya'o //
T02D1931:43b-37: de nas bya bar rigs pa zhig yin na /
T02D1931:43b-38: 'di ltar bdag ni dmyal bar song yang bla'i //
T02D1931:44a-1: mi 'gro bar bya zhing de'i rgyur 'di myur du gsad pas /
T02D1931:44a-2: 'di'i sdig pa mang du mi 'phel bar bya'o snyam
T02D1931:44a-3: du yang dag par snying rje bcos ma ma yin
T02D1931:44a-4: pa bskyed pa yang dang yang bya bas byang chub
T02D1931:44a-5: kyi sems gtan la dbab par bya'o //
T02D1931:44a-6: de nas sgrub pa'i gnas khyad par can dur khrod dang khang stong dang /
T02D1931:44a-9: shing gcig pa'i drung la sogs par 'gro bar bya ste /
T02D1931:44a-10: 'di ni gnas gtan la dbab pa'o //
T02D1931:44a-11: der yang bdag gcig pus brtsams pa dang /
T02D1931:44a-12: yang na grogs po gsang thub pa /
T02D1931:44a-14: 'jigs shing bag tsha ba med pa /
T02D1931:44a-16: sgrub pa po la snying nye ba /
T02D1931:44a-18: blo dang ldan pa bzhi man chad dang brtsams te /
T02D1931:44a-19: 'di ni zla grogs gtan la dbab pa'o //
T02D1931:44a-20: gnas der sha chen po dang tshil chen po la sogs pa /
T02D1931:44a-21: gtor ma dang lha bshos su bya ba dang /
T02D1931:44a-22: me tog nag po'am sngon po dang /
T02D1931:44a-26: dung la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad dang /
T02D1931:44a-27: gshin rje'i gzugs kyi rgyu dang /
T02D1931:44a-32: thod pa dang skud pa nag po la sogs pa yo byad thams cad dang ldan par byas te /
T02D1931:44a-33: 'di ni rdzas gtan la dbab pa'o //
T02D1931:44a-34: de nas 'khor lo bri bar bya ste /
T02D1931:44a-35: gtor ma byin la mchod pa 'jigs su rung ba'i tshogs kyang dbul te /
T02D1931:44a-36: mandala rab tu 'thas pa lci bas byugs pa byas la /
T02D1931:44a-37: sngags pa kha lhor bltas te /
T02D1931:44a-38: bdag khro bor gsal bas rtsa ba'i sngags zlos shing
T02D1931:44a-39: thod la kor gyis 'khor lo bri bar bya ste
T02D1931:44a-40: / gnas skabs 'dir yang 'khor lo bri ba dang /
T02D1931:44a-44: gshin rje la gtad pa dang /
T02D1931:44a-48: slar dbyung ba'i cho ga bya ste /
T02D1931:44a-49: rnam pa dgus bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1931:44a-50: de la 'khor lo bri ba ni /
T02D1931:44a-51: ri mo lnga bskor ba las snam bu bzhi dang /
T02D1931:44a-53: lte ba le'u tshe dgu pa'o //
T02D1931:44a-54: snam bu dang po le'u tshe bcu gnyis pa //
T02D1931:44b-0: gsum pa dang bzhi pa @44b phyal ba'am /
T02D1931:44b-2: de la lnga dang bcu gnyis la rtsa ba'i sngags dgod /
T02D1931:44b-3: bzhi mtshams la bskul tshig / bcu drug la yang
T02D1931:44b-4: bskul tshig / phyal ba nang ngos la a'a li
T02D1931:44b-6: yang re'u mig dang 'dra bar yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis te /
T02D1931:44b-7: a'a li nyis 'gyur dang k'a li la nga nya spang bar bya bas so //
T02D1931:44b-8: yi ge dag ri mo la ma reg par bya'o //
T02D1931:44b-10: de nas phyi'i 'khor lo la dpe byas te /
T02D1931:44b-11: nang gi 'khor lo ro ras la dkar rtsis byugs la /
T02D1931:44b-12: dug dang khrag bsres pa'i snag tsha bya rog gi
T02D1931:44b-13: sgro smyug gis blangs shing rtsa ba'i sngags zlos pas
T02D1931:44b-14: kha lhor bltas pas bris te /
T02D1931:44b-17: zin pa dang phyi'i 'khor lo nang gi 'khor lo la thim par bsams la dbyi'o //
T02D1931:44b-19: de nas rjes kyi sa dang /
T02D1931:44b-21: dug dang khrag dang dgra'i bshang gci byas pa'i sa dang /
T02D1931:44b-22: sbra tshil rnams bsres la ling+ga sor bzhi par bya //
T02D1931:44b-23: de'i snying gar las kyi sngags kyi mjug la ming rus m'a ra ya dang bcas par gzhug go //
T02D1931:44b-25: de nas rabs chad kyi thod pa'am /
T02D1931:44b-28: dgra'i bshang gci byas pa'i sa dang /
T02D1931:44b-29: spra tshil rnams bsres la ling+ga sor bzhi par bya /
T02D1931:44b-30: ga'u gnyis la gong ma la me 'bar ba bri /
T02D1931:44b-31: dbus su phat che ge mo m'a ra ya phat ces pa bri'o //
T02D1931:44b-32: 'og ma la rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sngags snga ma ltar bri //
T02D1931:44b-33: ga'u steng ma'i rgyab tu ri rab la dbang chen
T02D1931:44b-34: gyi dbus su rdo rje rgya gram ser po bri
T02D1931:44b-35: / de nas ga'u gong ma la bu ga smyug ma 'bring po shong ba cig gdod do //
T02D1931:44b-36: de nas 'khor lo g-yon du bskor ba 'og / g-yas su bskor ba steng /
T02D1931:44b-37: de'i dbus su ling ga bcug la /
T02D1931:44b-38: legs par dril nas skud pa nag pos bcings te
T02D1931:44b-39: ga'u kha sbyor du bcug la ga'u skud pa nag
T02D1931:44b-40: pos dkris te / ga'u'i bu ga nas dug sna tshogs pa'i phye ma dang /
T02D1931:44b-41: khrag bsres pa blugs pas gang bar bya'o //
T02D1931:44b-43: de nas rdo ba zur rngom pa zur gsum du
T02D1931:44b-44: 'dug pa'i sgyed bu gsum gyi khar ga'u bzhag la
T02D1931:45a-1: nas spor la dros pa tsam du bsros shig /'di ni ga'u bsro ba'o //
T02D1931:45a-3: sbra tshil las gshin rje'i rgyal po gzugs khru gang ba /
T02D1931:45a-4: rab tu spom pa mi'u thung 'dra ba gsus pa che ba /
T02D1931:45a-5: mche ba 'chang ba mdog gnag pa //
T02D1931:45a-8: skra kham pa 'dzings shing yegs la 'phyar ba /
T02D1931:45a-9: lag pa g-yas na dbyug pa lcags las byas pa thogs pa /
T02D1931:45a-10: g-yon na sdigs pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba la zhags pa bkal ba zhig byas la /
T02D1931:45a-11: de'i lto bar ga'u de bcug la sba ste /
T02D1931:45a-12: 'di ni gshin rje la gtad pa'o //
T02D1931:45a-13: da ni nang gi rnal 'byor bya ste /
T02D1931:45a-15: rnal 'byor pa kha lhor bltas te /
T02D1931:45a-16: rus sbal gyi 'dug stangs su gnas pas /
T02D1931:45a-17: ling ga de de nyid du bsam /
T02D1931:45a-18: 'khor lo gshin rje'i grong khyer du'o //
T02D1931:45a-19: de la rnam shes bkug cing bstims la /
T02D1931:45a-20: bcings te ye shes kyi lha dang dpral ba dang /
T02D1931:45a-21: kho'i nyes pa brtsi ba dang /
T02D1931:45a-22: rang gi dge ba'i stangs brtsi ba byas la /
T02D1931:45a-23: de nas rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas /
T02D1931:45a-24: khro bo srin po 'dra ba grangs med pa byung ba dang /
T02D1931:45a-25: de dag gis sprul cing bskul ba'i bya rgol dang khyi dang spyang ki dang /
T02D1931:45a-26: yam bu ru sha rnams kyis de gsod cing pags pa bshu ba dang /
T02D1931:45a-30: klad pa 'thog pa la sogs pa tantra nas 'byung ba ltar bsam zhing //
T02D1931:45a-31: gsang sngags m'a ra ya dang bcas par bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D1931:45a-32: de yang rang gi sems tshad dang rtags dang /
T02D1931:45a-33: bsnyen pa'i tshul las nyi ma gcig nas bdun gyi bar du bsgrims te bya /
T02D1931:45a-34: khyad par du ni nyin gung mtshan gung la bya ste /
T02D1931:45a-37: gnas der rang nyid kha lhor bltas la /
T02D1931:45a-38: dong zur gsum pa zab rings rab la rgyar khru gang ba cig brus la /
T02D1931:45a-39: der gshin rje'i gzugs de kha sbu ba la mgo lhor bstan te gzhag go //
T02D1931:45a-40: de nas 'byung po thams cad la de nyid du
T02D1931:45a-41: drag po'i ba lim byin la las bcol dpang gzugs
T02D1931:45a-42: so // de nas de ma thag tu bsgrub bya
T02D1931:45a-43: ya ma'i grong khyer na ya ma rnams kyis bzung
T02D1931:45a-45: ya ma r'a ja la bskul ba bya ste /
T02D1931:45b-0: @45b bdag shin tu khros shing lhar gsal bas 'di skad bskul lo //
T02D1931:45b-1: 'di nas lho yi phyogs rol na //
T02D1931:45b-2: dpag tshad brgyad khri'i pha rol na //
T02D1931:45b-3: thod pa lcags kyi grong khyer na //
T02D1931:45b-4: yi dags kun gyi sde dpon po //
T02D1931:45b-5: ma mo kun gyi tshogs rje bo //
T02D1931:45b-6: gson gshin kun gyi zam kha pa //
T02D1931:45b-7: gson po bskos la 'ded pa po //
T02D1931:45b-8: shi ba rnams kyi gshin bu rje //
T02D1931:45b-9: dge ba can gyi ltang sa 'dzin pa //
T02D1931:45b-10: sdig pa can gyi chad pa mkhan //
T02D1931:45b-11: nyes legs chos bzhin gcod pa po //
T02D1931:45b-12: chos rgyal gshin rje zhes bya ba //
T02D1931:45b-13: mngon shes rdzu 'phrul mthu rlabs can //
T02D1931:45b-15: bdag ni rnal 'byor sgrub pa po //
T02D1931:45b-16: 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i thugs kyi sras //
T02D1931:45b-17: gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1931:45b-18: rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1931:45b-19: bsam pa byang chub sems kyis brlan //
T02D1931:45b-20: rgyur ni ye shes rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1931:45b-21: gzi byin sku gsung thugs kyis bskyed//
T02D1931:45b-22: don ni 'gro ba yongs kyi don //
T02D1931:45b-23: las ni sangs rgyas kun gyi las //
T02D1931:45b-24: bka' ni dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' //
T02D1931:45b-25: rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la //
T02D1931:45b-27: che ge zhes bya'i gdug pa 'di //
T02D1931:45b-28: gson na 'gro ba yongs la gnod //
T02D1931:45b-29: dkon mchog gsum la rnam par 'tshe //
T02D1931:45b-30: dmigs kyi rnal 'byor yongs la sdang //
T02D1931:45b-31: 'di dag myur du bsgral ba'i phyir //
T02D1931:45b-33: dam tshig dbang gis gshegs su gsol //
T02D1931:45b-34: aom hr'i: shtr'i: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um
T02D1931:45b-35: phat ya ma r'a dza sa pa ri w'a ra
T02D1931:45b-36: a'a karsha ya dza: zhes brjod pas /
T02D1931:45b-37: rang gi snying ga nas 'od zer lcags kyu 'dra ba byung bas /
T02D1931:45b-38: ya ma r'a dza 'khor dang bcas pa gnas der 'ongs par bsam /
T02D1931:45b-39: de'i tshe phyag rgya sbyar ba ni /
T02D1931:45b-40: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur bcangs te /
T02D1931:45b-41: mthe bong nang du bcug nas mdzub mo cung zad bskyed de /
T02D1931:45b-42: gdengs thabs su 'phangs bstod pa ni be con gyi phyag rgya ste de sbyar ro //
T02D1931:45b-43: ya ma r'a dza ni ji ltar gzugs su byas
T02D1931:45b-44: pa la ma he zhon pa de dus mtshan dang
T02D1931:45b-45: bcas pa / 'khor ma mo dang ya ma'i skyes bu mang pos bskor ba'o //
T02D1931:45b-46: de nas phyag rgya bstan la //
T02D1931:45b-47: aom hr'i: shrri: wi kri t'a na na h'um phat
T02D1931:45b-48: ya ma r'a dza sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod
T02D1931:46a-1: la glags tshol mi nus par bsams te /
T02D1931:46a-2: phyag rgya rdo rje bsdams pa las srin lag gnyis brkyang nas gshibs te bsgreng pa'o //
T02D1931:46a-3: de nas gdong gi ya ma'i gzugs la me tog nag po gtor la /
T02D1931:46a-4: ya ma r'a dza 'khor bcas pa //
T02D1931:46a-5: dam tshig dbang gis 'dir brtan bzhugs //
T02D1931:46a-6: mchod pa tshul bzhin bzhes nas kyang //
T02D1931:46a-7: phrin las mdzad phyir ji srid du //
T02D1931:46a-8: las grub par du bzhugs su gsol //
T02D1931:46a-9: ya ma r'a dza sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod do //
T02D1931:46a-10: de nas lag pa g-yas pas be con gyi mu dra bcing /
T02D1931:46a-11: g-yon pas rakta dang chang bsres pas bkang ba'i bhandha thogs la aargha dbul te /
T02D1931:46a-12: ya ma r'a dza 'khor dang bcas pa la /
T02D1931:46a-13: aargha gsol bas dmar gyi aargha zhag gi me tog
T02D1931:46a-14: rgya mtsho ltar mi zad pa 'byung bar gyur cig
T02D1931:46a-15: / aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um
T02D1931:46a-16: phat ya ma rsha dza sa pa ri w'a ra
T02D1931:46a-17: aargham pra t'i tstsha ho zhes pas so //
T02D1931:46a-18: phyag rgya de nyid la gnas pas //
T02D1931:46a-19: g-yon gyi me tog blangs te ya ma r'a dza
T02D1931:46a-20: 'khor dang bcas pa la me tog phul bas me
T02D1931:46a-21: tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa tog dang /
T02D1931:46a-22: kha bad du ldan pa ka ba brgyad zug pa /
T02D1931:46a-23: me tog gi bla re dang /
T02D1931:46a-26: rin po che'i rang bzhin can 'byung bar gyur cig
T02D1931:46a-27: / aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um
T02D1931:46a-28: phat badzra pushpa p'u dza sa ma ye h'um zhes
T02D1931:46a-29: pas so // phyag rgya de nyid la gnas pas /
T02D1931:46a-30: g-yon gyi bdug pa blangs la /
T02D1931:46a-31: ya ma r'a dza 'khor dang bcas pa la bdug pa sna tshogs phul bas /
T02D1931:46a-32: gzhal yas khang gi mgul du bdug pa'i sprin bee
T02D1931:46a-33: d'u rya'i mdog lta bu rin chen brtsegs pa 'dra
T02D1931:46a-34: ba 'byung bar gyur cig / aom hr'i: shtri: wi
T02D1931:46a-35: kri t'a na na h'um phat badzra dh'u pa p'u
T02D1931:46a-36: dza sa ma ye h'um zhes pas so //
T02D1931:46a-37: de bzhin du g-yon pas mar me blangs la /
T02D1931:46a-38: ya ma r'a dza 'khor dang bcas pa la mar me phul bas /
T02D1931:46a-39: gzhal yas khang gi phyogs mtshams su mun pa 'joms
T02D1931:46a-40: pa nor bu'i 'od la sogs pa'i snang ba 'byung
T02D1931:46a-41: bar gyur cig / aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a
T02D1931:46a-42: na na h'um phat badzra d'i pa pa p'u dza
T02D1931:46a-43: sa ma ye h'um zhes pas so //
T02D1931:46a-44: de bzhin du g-yon pas byug pa blangs la /
T02D1931:46a-45: ya ma r'a dza 'khor dang bcas pa la byug
T02D1931:46a-46: pa phul bas lus dang gnas kyi dri ma thams
T02D1931:46a-47: cad dag ste / reg na bde ba'i reg bya
T02D1931:46b-0: dang dri bsnams bzod pa dang ldan pas @46b tshim
T02D1931:46b-1: par gyur cig / aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a
T02D1931:46b-2: na na h'um phat badzra gandha p'u dza sa ma
T02D1931:46b-4: de bzhin du g-yon pas bshos bteg la /
T02D1931:46b-5: ya ma r'a dza 'khor dang bcas pa la bshos
T02D1931:46b-6: phul bas kha zas dri dang ro dang kha dog
T02D1931:46b-7: phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1931:46b-10: dmar po dang sngon po dang bcas pa /
T02D1931:46b-11: kham gyi zas la gnas pa rnams tshim par byed
T02D1931:46b-12: pa'i mthu dang ldan pa rnams 'byung bar gyur cig
T02D1931:46b-13: / aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um
T02D1931:46b-14: phat badzra nee wi dya p'a dza sa ma ye
T02D1931:46b-16: de bzhin du g-yon pas ba lim bteg la 'das ma thag pa'i tshig rjes la /
T02D1931:46b-17: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um phat
T02D1931:46b-18: ma h'a ba lim p'u dza sa ma ye h'um
T02D1931:46b-19: zhes pas ba lim dbul lo //
T02D1931:46b-20: de nas sil snyan sna tshogs bsgrags la nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags brjod do //
T02D1931:46b-21: de nas lag pa g-yas pa de bzhin du gnas
T02D1931:46b-22: pa las g-yon pa'i khu tshur thod pa'i tshul du
T02D1931:46b-23: byas la / tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams kyis bskul bar bya'o //
T02D1931:46b-24: bcom ldan gshin rje gshed po'i bka' //
T02D1931:46b-25: chos kyi rgyal po dgongs su gsol //
T02D1931:46b-26: de ring drag po'i phrin las 'di //
T02D1931:46b-27: khyed kyi las su 'os pa yin //
T02D1931:46b-28: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na //
T02D1931:46b-29: legs nyes chos bzhin gcod pa khyod //
T02D1931:46b-30: gshin rje gshed kyi bka' 'khor na //
T02D1931:46b-31: bka' nyan dam tshig bsrung ba khyod //
T02D1931:46b-32: las dang rkyen gyis 'chi ba la //
T02D1931:46b-33: srog la dbang byed bdag po khyod //
T02D1931:46b-34: da phyir las 'di khyod la gtad //
T02D1931:46b-36: tha mal sems can nyes med cing //
T02D1931:46b-37: gzhan gyis bskul bar ma byas par //
T02D1931:46b-38: glo bur phrad pa 'dzin byed na //
T02D1931:46b-39: nga yis gtad pa'i las 'di rnams //
T02D1931:46b-40: 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i bka' bzhin du //
T02D1931:46b-41: dam tshig phyag rgya mig la bstan //
T02D1931:46b-42: dam tshig snying po rna bar bsgrags //
T02D1931:46b-43: rdo rje tha tshig snying la bzhag //
T02D1931:46b-44: dam rdzas mchod pa phul nas kyang //
T02D1931:46b-45: dam tshig phrin las gnyer du gtad //
T02D1931:46b-46: las 'di mngon du bsgrub pa'i rigs //
T02D1931:46b-47: khyod kyis las 'di ma bsgrubs na //
T02D1931:46b-48: dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' yang bcag / gshin rje gshed po'i dam yang dral //
T02D1931:46b-49: rang gi tha tshig rang gis bslus //
T02D1931:46b-50: dam tshig grogs po bdag cag gi //
T02D1931:47a-2: de bas las 'di grub par gyis //
T02D1931:47a-4: ya ma d'u ti zhes bya ba //
T02D1931:47a-5: lag na lcags kyu nag po thogs //
T02D1931:47a-6: gang zhig gzung bar 'dod pa de //
T02D1931:47a-7: g-yugs pa tsam gyis 'dzin par byed //
T02D1931:47a-8: khyod la gnyer du gtad pa ni //
T02D1931:47a-9: che ge zhes bya'i yul khams na //
T02D1931:47a-10: che ge mo zhes bya ba'i ming //
T02D1931:47a-11: rus ni che ge mo zhes bya //
T02D1931:47a-13: khyod kyis de ring gzung bar gyis //
T02D1931:47a-15: k'a la p'a sha zhes bya ba //
T02D1931:47a-16: lag na dus kyi zhags pa thogs //
T02D1931:47a-18: btab pa tsam gyis 'dzin par byed //
T02D1931:47a-19: lhag ma snga ma bzhin yin no //
T02D1931:47a-21: ya ma damshtri zhes bya ba //
T02D1931:47a-22: lag na be con nag po thogs //
T02D1931:47a-23: gang zhig bsad par 'dod pa kun //
T02D1931:47a-24: phyar ba tsam gyis 'chi bar byed ;
T02D1931:47a-25: / lhag ma snga ma bzhin yin no //
T02D1931:47a-28: za byed mche ba 'bar ba can //
T02D1931:47a-29: gang zhig za bar 'dod pa de //
T02D1931:47a-30: gtsigs pa tsam gyis za bar byed //
T02D1931:47a-31: lhag ma snga ma bzhin yin no //
T02D1931:47a-33: / k'a la r'a tri la sogs pa'i //
T02D1931:47a-34: gsod pa mo dang nag mo dang //
T02D1931:47a-35: nam gru sha ka li la sogs //
T02D1931:47a-36: bud med tshogs kyis bskor ba ni //
T02D1931:47a-37: la la las kyi me long can //
T02D1931:47a-38: la la nad kyi rkyal ba can //
T02D1931:47a-39: la la mtshon gyi dru gu can //
T02D1931:47a-40: la la bdud kyi khram bam can //
T02D1931:47a-41: la la shod rde'u dkar nag can //
T02D1931:47a-42: la la lcags kyi dre'u rta can //
T02D1931:47a-43: la la bong bu gva pa zhon //
T02D1931:47a-44: la la rlung nag 'tshub ma zhon //
T02D1931:47a-45: la la chu bya nag mo zhon //
T02D1931:47a-46: la la nam gyi gung la rgyu //
T02D1931:47a-47: la la chu bo'i gzhung la rgyu //
T02D1931:47a-48: la la nyi ma'i zer la rgyu //
T02D1931:47a-49: kun kyang gzhan srog 'phrog pa ste //
T02D1931:47a-50: khyed la gnyer du gtad pa ni //
T02D1931:47a-51: lhag ma snga ma bzhin yin no //
T02D1931:47a-53: ya ba ti dang phyva ba sangs dang //
T02D1931:47a-54: rmig pa ral pa dgu la sogs //
T02D1931:47a-55: la la rgyal po'i tshul du gnas //
T02D1931:47a-56: la la blon po'i tshul du gnas //
T02D1931:47a-57: kha cig dag ni sde dpon tshul //
T02D1931:47a-58: lag na be con 'khor lo dang //
T02D1931:47b-0: gsal shing la @47b sogs mtshon cha thogs //
T02D1931:47b-1: so so'i sde dpon mngags pa dang //
T02D1931:47b-2: pho nya phyag brnyan bcas pa la //
T02D1931:47b-3: 'phrin las myur du gtad pa ni //
T02D1931:47b-4: che ge zhes bya'i yul khams na //
T02D1931:47b-5: che ge mo zhes bya ba'i ming //
T02D1931:47b-6: rus ni che ge mo zhes bya //
T02D1931:47b-8: khyod kyis deng 'dir gzung bar gyis //
T02D1931:47b-9: zhes bskul zhing dmar gyi aargha lan gsum gsum du sgreng zhing /
T02D1931:47b-10: gong gi aargha'i sngags brjod do //
T02D1931:47b-11: de nas mna' chu blud par bya ste /
T02D1931:47b-12: dri cha gyi nang du bdud rtsi lnga blugs la nang du rdo rje bcug la /
T02D1931:47b-13: aom badzra da ka h'um tha zhes ci ran cig bzlas nas /
T02D1931:47b-14: de nas ya ma'i gzugs kyi khar rdo rje bzhag ste /
T02D1931:47b-15: steng nas dri chab blugs la /
T02D1931:47b-16: ya ma r'a dza 'khor bcas kyi snying gar ye
T02D1931:47b-17: shes kyi rdo rje 'od 'bar ba re rer gyur
T02D1931:47b-18: par bsams te / 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D1931:47b-19: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D1931:47b-20: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
T02D1931:47b-22: gal te dam tshig 'das gyur na //
T02D1931:47b-23: 'jam dpal rdo rje khros nas kyang //
T02D1931:47b-24: snying ga nas ni gshegs par 'gyur //
T02D1931:47b-25: aom badzrod ka h'um tha: sngon gyi tha tshig dran bya'i phyir //
T02D1931:47b-26: rdo rje'i tha tshig 'di bsnan pas //
T02D1931:47b-27: mi phyed rdo rje'i dam tshig ni //
T02D1931:47b-28: khyod kyi snying la gnas par 'gyur //
T02D1931:47b-29: aom badzra sa ma ya tishtha zhes brjod de //
T02D1931:47b-30: rdo rje ya ma'i snying gar gtug go //
T02D1931:47b-31: de nas gzugs de sas rab tu dam par sbas la /
T02D1931:47b-32: sus kyang sbas par mi shes pa de ltar nan tan byas la /
T02D1931:47b-33: de'i steng du khro bo'i tsha mang gi stang stabs byas la rang gi gnas su 'gro ste /
T02D1931:47b-34: 'di ni 'khor lo sba ba'i tshul lo //
T02D1931:47b-36: bzlas pa'i mthu khyad par can yod pa des ni /
T02D1931:47b-38: gshin rje la gtad pa dang /
T02D1931:47b-39: 'khor lo sba ba dag la 'bad pa de snyed mi bya ste /
T02D1931:47b-40: 'khor lo bris pa la nang gi rnal 'byor dang bzlas pa byas la /
T02D1931:47b-41: thod par bcug pa de nyid sbas pas chog gi
T02D1931:47b-42: las kyi gshin rje la ched cher gtad pa de
T02D1931:47b-44: de nas rjes kyi rnal 'byor ni /
T02D1931:47b-45: 'khor lo sbas pa'i rting la rang gi gnas su gsang sngags rjes su bskul zhing /
T02D1931:47b-47: ya ma'i skyes bu rnams la yang gtor ma bzang po byin la drag tu bskul /
T02D1931:48a-1: gis bsten cing gnyen pa'i 'jig rten pa yod na de'i las kyi sbyor ba yang bya zhing /
T02D1931:48a-2: de yang drag tu bskul te btang /
T02D1931:48a-3: bsrungs pa 'dren par der lha dang dbral ba yang bya ste /
T02D1931:48a-5: slar dbyung ba'i cho ga ni /
T02D1931:48a-6: las grub na 'khor lo slar phyung la ;
T02D1931:48a-7: ya m'anta ka la mchod pa byas la /
T02D1931:48a-8: ya ma r'a dza la yang mchod pa snga ma ltar phul la /
T02D1931:48a-9: 'khor lo 'o mas bkru zhing sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags bzlas te /
T02D1931:48a-10: lha rnams la bzod par gsol nas /
T02D1931:48a-11: rdzas rnams chu klung du bkrus la de nyid du dor bar bya'o //
T02D1931:48a-12: 'di ni 'khor lo'i don rnam par bshad pa las /
T02D1931:48a-13: drag po'i 'khor lo bstan pa ste /
T02D1931:48a-14: zhi ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1931:48a-15: rtogs sla bas bdag gis ma bshad do //
T02D1931:48a-16: las kyi sngags la dmigs shing /
T02D1931:48a-17: rtsa ba'i sngags ma bsnyen pas ni 'khrul 'khor mi bya ste /
T02D1931:48a-19: bzlas pa dang gtor ma dag gis las rnam pa bcu la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1931:48a-20: ma mo'i gnas la sogs par mar ngo'i nyin phyed na song la /
T02D1931:48a-21: thab khung gru gsum zabs su sor bcu pa rgyar sor nyi shu pa /
T02D1931:48a-22: dbus na padma 'dab brgyad la rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon pos mtshan pa /
T02D1931:48a-23: mu ran nang ma la yang mtshon cha ;
T02D1931:48a-24: phyi ma la yang sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha can du drag po'i lha dang /
T02D1931:48a-25: me lha'i zhal du drag po'i sreg rdzas rnams dbul lo //
T02D1931:48a-26: sngags kyang drag po m'a ra ya phat ces pa dang ldan pas so //
T02D1931:48a-27: de yang dang por drag po'i thab khung byas la /
T02D1931:48a-30: mchod rdzas dang sreg rdzas bkram la rang ya m'anta kar bskyed do //
T02D1931:48a-31: de nas thab khung du drag po'i me sbar la /
T02D1931:48a-32: me sbar ma thag tu h'um zhes brjod la tsha
T02D1931:48a-33: ba'i mar khu dgang gzar bdun nam gsum dbul bas
T02D1931:48a-35: de ma thag tu thab kyi dbus su yi ge
T02D1931:48a-36: ram nag po gyur pa las me lha mthing nag
T02D1931:48a-37: drang srong ral pa can phreng ba dang /
T02D1931:48a-40: mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i lag pa can rlung gi me bsam mo //
T02D1931:48a-41: de nas aom ae hye hi ma h'a bh'u ta /
T02D1931:48a-42: de ba ri shi dvi dza sa ta ma gri hi tva aa h'u ti aa h'a ri /
T02D1931:48a-43: aasmin sa na ni hi to bha b'a zhes lan
T02D1931:48b-0: gsum brjod pas thab @48b 'gram gyi mkha' la byon
T02D1931:48b-1: par bsam / de la aargha dang mchod pa dbul /
T02D1931:48b-2: aom badzra aa na la ma h'a bh'u ta dzrv'a la ya /
T02D1931:48b-3: sarba dusht'an bhasmin ku ru h'um phat /
T02D1931:48b-4: dri shya dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam
T02D1931:48b-5: aa ham zhes brjod pas thab tu bskyed pa la
T02D1931:48b-6: bstim / de nas me lha khros shing kha gdangs
T02D1931:48b-7: pa la dgang blugs la sogs pa sngags kyi mthar
T02D1931:48b-8: che ge mo m'a ra ya phat dang ldan pas
T02D1931:48b-9: rdzas sum cha tsam phul la /
T02D1931:48b-10: me lha'i snying gar lha mchog bskyed /
T02D1931:48b-11: de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la bstims
T02D1931:48b-12: la mchod pa bstod byas nas khros pa'i zhal du
T02D1931:48b-14: de nas phrin las zhus la /
T02D1931:48b-15: yi ge brgya pa brjod la /
T02D1931:48b-16: de aom a'a: h'um mu: zhes pas slar gshegs nas /
T02D1931:48b-17: dam tshig sems dpa' bdag la bsdu /
T02D1931:48b-18: rdzas lhag ma me lha la dbul te /
T02D1931:48b-19: las bcol te bzod par gsol la slar yi ge gsum mu:'i mtha' can gyis gshegs su gsol la /
T02D1931:48b-20: khrag gam chu nag pos me bsad do //
T02D1931:48b-21: sreg rdzas tha dad pa'i sngags dang ho ma gzar la sogs pa ni 'dir ma bshad de /
T02D1931:48b-22: gzhung gzhan las gsal bas der blta'o //
T02D1931:48b-23: zhi ba la sogs pa'i yang ci rigs su sbyar ro //
T02D1931:48b-24: 'di ni las kyi sngags kyi bya ba mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1931:48b-25: da ni snying po'i sngags la gnas pa'i bya ba bshad de /
T02D1931:48b-26: sngon bzhin du lha'i sku bskyed ma thag tu /
T02D1931:48b-27: aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes pas chu zla ltar bsams la /
T02D1931:48b-28: ye shes sems dpa' bstim pa nas dbang bskur ba'i
T02D1931:48b-29: ngang du byas la 'gro ba drug tu 'od zer
T02D1931:48b-30: drug spros pas rang rang la lhag par shas che
T02D1931:48b-32: sdug bsngal bsal bar yang dang yang du byas la /
T02D1931:48b-33: skyo na gsang sngags bzlas te /
T02D1931:48b-34: ldang ba na dge ba byang chub chen por bsngos
T02D1931:48b-35: la yan lag drug gi srung ba byas la ldang
T02D1931:48b-36: ngo // gtor ma dang yi ge brgya pa sngon bzhin no //
T02D1931:48b-37: snang ba rnam par dag pa'i rdzogs rim dang rtag tu ldan par bya'o //
T02D1931:48b-38: nus pa lta na de kho na yid la byed pa'i rdzogs rim la yang gnas par bya'o //
T02D1931:48b-39: da ni rnam pa gsum char dang 'brel ba'i 'chi
T02D1931:48b-40: ba'i dus su yid la bya ba'i man ngag bstan
T02D1931:49a-0: par bya ste / des dam tshig dang 'gal ba ci byas pa rnams legs par @49a * //
T02D1931:49a-1: yid la byas la rab tu 'gyod cing phyis mi bya ba'i bsam pas /
T02D1931:49a-2: 'gro ba yul du gyur ba rnams dang 'dod pa'i lha dang /
T02D1931:49a-3: chos skyong ba rnams la bshags par bya'o //
T02D1931:49a-4: des dge ba ci byas pa rnams 'gro ba'i don
T02D1931:49a-5: du byang chub tu bsngos la shi ma thag tu
T02D1931:49a-6: sangs rgyas dngos su bzhugs pa'i zhing du rdzus te
T02D1931:49a-15: dran pa la sogs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur te /
T02D1931:49a-17: lam bde bas tshogs rnam pa gnyis bde blag tu bsags te /
T02D1931:49a-18: myur du byang chub par gyur cig ces bsngo bar bya'o //
T02D1931:49a-19: de nas 'di ltar gang rdo rje'i sku mnga' ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang sku ched du 'jig cing /
T02D1931:49a-20: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas las dang nyon mongs
T02D1931:49a-21: pa dang bral ba rnams kyang ched du lus la
T02D1931:49a-23: bdag gi lus rnag can mthong ba'i chos la dngos grub kyi snod du ma gyur cing /
T02D1931:49a-24: bsrung ba byas pa sha thang ba'i 'di la ci
T02D1931:49a-25: zhig chags su yod ces lus dang srog la chags
T02D1931:49a-27: de nas yang don dam pa byang chub kyi sems la dmigs nas skye ba dang /
T02D1931:49a-29: 'chi ba nam mkha' lta bu rga ba dang kun du skyo ba la grol ba /
T02D1931:49a-30: blo'i blang dor dang 'jigs pa rnam par spangs shing /
T02D1931:49a-31: 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten smig rgyu tsam du shes par bya'o //
T02D1931:49a-32: de nas bdag gi lus dang gnas dang /
T02D1931:49a-33: longs spyod sgyu ma lta bu rnams /
T02D1931:49a-34: bsam pa thag pa nas sems can thams cad la byin cing /
T02D1931:49a-35: de'i 'og tu rang gi lus 'dod pa'i lha'i skur
T02D1931:49a-36: rnam par bsams te phyogs bcu thams cad rnam par
T02D1931:49a-37: dag pa'i zhing / lha'i rgyal po dang bsnyen bkur
T02D1931:49a-38: gyi gnas ltar yid du 'ong bar bsams la lhag
T02D1931:49a-39: pa'i lha la yang dang yang du yid gtad de
T02D1931:49a-40: dag pa'i zhing / / tshor ba thams cad zil gyis mnan par bya'o //
T02D1931:49a-41: de'i snang ba'i yul du 'ong ba dang /
T02D1931:49a-42: mi 'ong ba'i mtshan ma ci byung yang dga' ba
T02D1931:49a-43: dang 'jigs pa mi bskyed cing dri za'i grong khyer
T02D1931:49a-44: ltar bsam mo // 'di ni 'chi ba'i dus su yid la bya ba'i man ngag go //
T02D1931:49a-45: gang zhig bla ma la gus snying rjes rgyud 'jam pas //
T02D1931:49a-46: chos kun stong bar shes shing yul la 'dod pa spang //
T02D1931:49b-0: @49b gnyen po'i mthu ldan blo gros dri ma rnams dang bral //
T02D1931:49b-1: 'gro ba skyob byed gdugs dkar lta bu de rnams dang //
T02D1931:49b-2: bdag gi yang dag rtags pas smras pa'i gtam tshul 'di //
T02D1931:49b-3: myur du bar chad med par nyams len byed bcas
T02D1931:49b-4: phrad gyur cig / ji srid sa la 'gro ba'i
T02D1931:49b-6: de srid gtam 'di nyams pa med par 'gro don
T02D1931:49b-7: gnas par shog / gtam tshul 'di ni gsal smras
T02D1931:49b-8: pas // 'gro ba 'jam dbyangs 'drar gyur cig / bdag dang chos kun sgyu 'dra bar //
T02D1931:49b-9: myur rig 'jam dpal nyid gyur cig / dpal gshin
T02D1931:49b-10: rje'i gshed dgra nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs 'khor lo'i
T02D1931:49b-11: don rgyas par bshad pa dang bcas pa slob dpon
T02D1931:49b-12: mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa
T02D1931:49b-15: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po a'a ts'arya bi n'a ya tsandra dang /
